verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Glory to His name,
Glory to His name;

verse.name: c1b
v1a
verse.lines:
Down at the cross
where my Savior died,
Down where for cleansing
from sin I cried,

verse.name: v1b
v2a
verse.lines:
I am so wondrously
saved from sin,
Jesus so sweetly
abides within;

verse.name: v2b
v3a
verse.lines:
Oh, precious fountain
that saves from sin,
I am so glad
I have entered in;

verse.name: v3b

verse.lines:

so rich and sweet,
